module.name: Zork
module.description: Zoip is a new way of playing Zork - It uses Text-to-Speech and Speech Recognition to play the classic infocom game, Zork. It appears as a destination. If you wish to play this without needing to go through an IVR, the easy way is to create a Ring Group with an invalid extension in it, and a destination of Zoip.
module.attention:
This is a 7 Megabyte download. It may not be able to download via this interface properly. In addition, Sphinx2 and Festival are required.
Please see http://aussievoip.com.au/wiki/freePBX-ZoIP before installing this module.
